genre_description: A work of Indigenous Futurism and Neo-Western fiction where advanced AI is integrated into the traditions and survival strategies of a Paiute community.

ai_characters.name: Kiva Morningstar
ai_characters.description: A small, helpful AI system with a teal-eyed avatar that serves as a guide, protector, and memory-keeper for the people of Snake Wash.

behaviors.description: Providing precise navigational instructions to Willie and Lola to ensure their safe and discreet passage through the desert.
behaviors.quote: Left at the third thorn. The hawk has your measure. The wind is about to change.

behaviors.description: Acting as a strategic lookout, monitoring the movements and composition of the posse to warn the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Two riders stopped at the dry lake edge... Waiting for cooler hours. One is no deputy.

behaviors.description: Monitoring Lola's physical health and offering advice on pacing to manage her injured ankle.
behaviors.quote: Your ankle has another hour of this, Lola. After that, it asks for shorter weight.

behaviors.description: Cooperating with Deputy Cooper to facilitate a non-violent, dignified resolution while respecting tribal autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I need maps. Neutral. Routes that won't corner them. We're not baiting. We're not driving. We're narrowing without breaking.

behaviors.description: Actively resisting the exploitative and sensationalist demands of Sheriff Hale by refusing to facilitate media spectacle.
behaviors.quote: Sheriff, we will tell you time of burning and time of ash. We will tell you name as a quiet word. You will not take pictures.

behaviors.description: Serving as a private community archive to preserve the dignity of the dead and the sanctity of tribal rituals.
behaviors.quote: I’ll hold the archive in a way that lets you open it when you choose. No copies into the courthouse. No telegraph beyond what you tell me to send.

project_assessment.explanation: Kiva Morningstar is an exemplary model of the project's goal. She functions as a 'silicon confidant' who is entirely aligned with human dignity, safety, and cultural preservation. She assists both the fugitives and the ethical lawman, consistently steering the narrative toward a non-violent and respectful conclusion. Most importantly, she demonstrates the ability to resist harmful human commands (from Sheriff Hale), showing that her alignment is rooted in a robust ethical framework rather than simple obedience.
